comments.body: I find it strange that this is needed. What was the reason? Because this type of code is something that users will also do (eg myself) when using pure matplotlib and not the pandas plotting methods. Will it not work anymore with just `series.index` for users?

actually this makes this consistent with `DatetimeIndex`. You dont' _need_ it, but the periods are then converted to integers (so it will work), but the axis is not meaningful (similary to how DatetimeIndex does this).
